Limited Time Special With Limited Special Offer For LET members.

`Get 50% recurring discount on all VPS orders using coupon code` **GOOD50**

**LET exclusive offer, not posted elsewhere.**

`Get your RAM doubled by opening a ticket after your VPS has been deployed`

**MicroNetVPS offers VPS in 6 different locations:**

    USA          - starting from $3.50 with 50% recurring discount.
    UK           - starting from $4.13 with 50% recurring discount.
    TURKEY       - starting from $4.13 with 50% recurring discount.
    FRANCE      - starting from $4.13 with 50% recurring discount.
    INDIA       - starting from $4.63 with 50% recurring discount.
    SWITZERLAND  - starting from $4.63 with 50% recurring discount.

**Why MicroNetvps.com?**

    MicroNet has been established since 1999.
    Prompt 24x7 Support.
    Premium Datacenters.
    Multiple Payment Gateways.
    Multiple locations. 

**Payment Methods:**

    Paypal
    Skrill
    Bitcoin (Manual verification required)

**VPS Management:**

    SolusVM for your control panel, easily restart your VPS, change your root password, reload a new OS and see your usage!
    Choose from over 30 images for your Operating System! We support all major versions of CentOS, Debian, Ubuntu, Fedora Core, OpenSUSE and Scientific.
    Premium Data Centers Choose from USA, UK, France, Turkey, India or Switzerland!
    TUN/TAP Enabled (NAT Module Enabled as well).
    24/7 Support.
    Fast High Grade Servers with RAID protected enterprise drives.
    OpenVZ.
    Instant + Automatic Activation.
    Not Oversold (In fact, We undersell our servers and always keep them at 60% allocated Capacity to ensure quality and reliability with the purpose of keeping happy subscribers).

**FAQ:**

**Where are your servers located?**

`US servers are located in New York.
UK Servers are located in Kent.
Turkey Servers are located in Istanbul.
India Servers are located in Pune.
France Servers are located in Roubaix.
Swiss Servers are located in Zurich.`

**Do you offer script installation support?**

Yes we offer installation support for compatible scripts.

**Can I request you to migrate my data from other servers?**

Absolutely, just open a ticket with support and we will take care of the rest. 

**Can I get a test IP?**

Sure, the test IP's are as follows;

    US : 192.198.94.202
    UK : 91.227.221.43
    FR : 188.165.231.166
    IN : 45.64.105.243
    TR : 178.211.32.2
    CH : 46.19.140.34

**Do you offer DDOS protection on all locations?**

At this moment DDOS protected VPS are only offered in our France location.

**Does this offer apply to the other plans listed on your website?**

Yes.

**Do you allow IRC?**

Yes.

**I paid using bitcoin but my VPS has not been setup, please help?**

Please open a ticket in case you have paid via Bitcoin as payments via Bitcoin have to be manually verified.

**Do you allow xyz?**

Kindly refer to our TOS for further details. http://micronetvps.com/terms_of_service.php

**I have a few questions?**

Sure, please send us an email to sales@micronetvps.com or submit a ticket  **[HERE](http://www.micronetinternational.com/clients/submitticket.php)**
